5 Getting started 5.1 Installing packages If you have installed related packages already, you can jump to the next step. #install.packages("data.table") #install.packages("dtplyr") 5.2 Loading packages Load the packages for todays seminar. #load the packages for this seminar library(data.table) ## data.table 1.13.2 using 8 threads (see ?getDTthreads). Latest news: r-datatable.com library(dtplyr) Note: Once you have loaded the package successfully, there will be a check mark display before the package under your packages tab at the bottom right pane. 5.3 Dataset
